entries.title: The companies that hold your crypto aren't insured the way banks are
entries.description: The "crypto winter" that hit earlier this year walloped digital asset prices and served as a healthy reminder that cryptocurrencies are highly risky, volatile investments.

entries.title: Israeli President invites Netanyahu to form government
entries.description: Israel's President Isaac Herzog asked Benjamin Netanyahu to form a new government on Sunday, allowing the former prime minister to secure the country's top job for a record sixth time and extend his record as the nation's longest-serving leader.

entries.title: Elon Musk in court over Tesla pay that made him the world's richest man
entries.description: Tesla and CEO Elon Musk will spend this week in court to defend the massive compensation package that helped make him the world's richest man.

entries.title: Cruise ship with 800 Covid-positive passengers docks in Sydney
entries.description: A cruise ship with hundreds of Covid-positive passengers docked in Sydney, Australia, after being hit by a wave of infections.
